questions.question: What does Joey say happened to him in the previous episode?
options: He went to the beach with his friends
He found out about Phoebe's mom and dad
He got a new job
He met a new girl
questions.correct_answer: He went to the beach with his friends
questions.explanation: Joey is recapping what happened in the previous episode and mentions going to the beach.

questions.question: What does Phoebe Sr. tell Phoebe about her birth?
options: She was adopted by Phoebe's current mom
She was born out of wedlock
She was the result of a polyamorous relationship
She was born to a different family
questions.correct_answer: She was the result of a polyamorous relationship
questions.explanation: Phoebe Sr. explains to Phoebe that she was born as a result of a polyamorous relationship between her and two other people.

questions.question: Why does Ross have to break up with Bonnie?
options: Because he still has feelings for Rachel
Because Bonnie is moving away
Because Bonnie doesn't like him anymore
Because Ross's friends don't like Bonnie
questions.correct_answer: Because he still has feelings for Rachel
questions.explanation: Ross has to break up with Bonnie because he still has romantic feelings for Rachel.

questions.question: What is the contents of Rachel's letter to Ross?
options: A list of things she wants to do together
A description of her feelings for him
A set of conditions for them to get back together
A story about her childhood
questions.correct_answer: A set of conditions for them to get back together
questions.explanation: Rachel's letter outlines conditions for her and Ross to get back together, including taking responsibility for past mistakes.

questions.question: What happens to Monica at the beach?
options: She gets a sunburn
She finds a rare seashell
She gets stung by a jellyfish
She meets a new friend
questions.correct_answer: She gets stung by a jellyfish
questions.explanation: Monica gets stung by a jellyfish while at the beach, causing her a lot of pain.

questions.question: What does Joey suggest as a remedy for Monica's jellyfish sting?
options: To put ice on it
To take her to the hospital
To pee on it
To give her painkillers
questions.correct_answer: To pee on it
questions.explanation: Joey suggests that peeing on the jellyfish sting could help alleviate the pain, based on something he saw on The Discovery Channel.

questions.question: What is the outcome of Phoebe's meeting with her birth mother?
options: They decide to meet again
They decide to never meet again
They start a new relationship
They fight and never speak again
questions.correct_answer: They decide to meet again
questions.explanation: Phoebe and her birth mother, Phoebe Sr., start to connect and decide to meet again, despite initial reservations.

questions.question: What does Ross yell at the end of the episode?
options: I love you, Rachel!
We were on a break!
I'm sorry, Rachel!
I'll never forgive you, Rachel!
questions.correct_answer: We were on a break!
questions.explanation: Ross yells 'We were on a break!' in frustration after his argument with Rachel.

questions.question: What does Chandler say to Monica at the end of the episode?
options: I love you, Monica
You will always be the girl I peed on
I'm sorry for what happened at the beach
Let's never talk about the beach again
questions.correct_answer: You will always be the girl I peed on
questions.explanation: Chandler makes a joke about peeing on Monica, referencing the earlier incident at the beach.

questions.question: What is the result of Ross and Rachel's argument at the end of the episode?
options: They make up and get back together
They decide to take a break from each other
They break up for good
They start counseling to work through their issues
questions.correct_answer: They break up for good
questions.explanation: Ross and Rachel have a fight and decide to break up, with Rachel saying 'We are so over!'

questions.question: What does Phoebe Sr. say to Phoebe about her decision not to look for her?
options: She was afraid of being rejected
She was busy with her career
She didn't think Phoebe would want to meet her
She didn't know where to find Phoebe
questions.correct_answer: She was afraid of being rejected
questions.explanation: Phoebe Sr. tells Phoebe that she was afraid of being rejected, which is why she didn't try to find her earlier.

questions.question: What does Ross read in Rachel's letter that makes him realize he didn't finish reading it?
options: A list of things she wants to do together
A description of her feelings for him
A set of conditions for them to get back together
The phrase 'Does it?'
questions.correct_answer: The phrase 'Does it?'
questions.explanation: Ross reads the phrase 'Does it?' in Rachel's letter and realizes he didn't finish reading the entire letter.

questions.question: What is the reason for Ross's outburst at the end of the episode?
options: He is upset about his argument with Rachel
He is frustrated about his relationship with Bonnie
He is angry about being cheated on
He is upset about not finishing Rachel's letter
questions.correct_answer: He is upset about his argument with Rachel
questions.explanation: Ross's outburst at the end of the episode is a result of his argument with Rachel and his frustration about their relationship.

questions.question: What does Joey say to Chandler about the jellyfish incident?
options: It was his fault
It was Chandler's fault
He would pee on anyone if they needed help
He would never pee on anyone again
questions.correct_answer: He would pee on anyone if they needed help
questions.explanation: Joey tells Chandler that he would pee on anyone if they needed help, referencing the jellyfish incident.

questions.question: What is the result of Phoebe's conversation with Ursula about their birth mother?
options: Ursula reveals she has been in contact with their birth mother
Ursula gives Phoebe a letter from their birth mother
Ursula tells Phoebe she already knows about their birth mother
Ursula gives Phoebe a suicide note from their mom
questions.correct_answer: Ursula tells Phoebe she already knows about their birth mother
questions.explanation: Ursula reveals to Phoebe that she already knows about their birth mother, and even has a suicide note from their mom that mentions her.

questions.question: What does Rachel say to Ross about his taking responsibility for their past mistakes?
options: She says he is taking too much responsibility
She says he is not taking enough responsibility
She says he is taking the right amount of responsibility
She says it doesn't matter if he takes responsibility or not
questions.correct_answer: She says he is not taking enough responsibility
questions.explanation: Rachel tells Ross that he is not taking enough responsibility for their past mistakes, which is a condition for them to get back together.

questions.question: What does Chandler say to Monica about playing cards naked?
options: He says it's a great idea
He says it's a terrible idea
He says they should try it sometime
He says they can only play cards naked if they're a couple
questions.correct_answer: He says they can only play cards naked if they're a couple
questions.explanation: Chandler jokingly tells Monica that they can play cards naked if they're a couple, which Monica rejects.

questions.question: What is the significance of the jellyfish incident in the episode?
options: It's a metaphor for the characters' relationships
It's a plot device to advance the story
It's a comedic relief moment
It's a symbol of the characters' growth and development
questions.correct_answer: It's a comedic relief moment
questions.explanation: The jellyfish incident is a comedic relief moment in the episode, providing humor and lightheartedness to the story.

questions.question: What does Phoebe say to her birth mother about getting to know her?
options: She says she's willing to get to know her
She says she's not interested in getting to know her
She says she needs time to think about it
She says she's angry and hurt
questions.correct_answer: She says she's angry and hurt
questions.explanation: Phoebe tells her birth mother that she's angry and hurt about being given up for adoption, and doesn't know if she wants to get to know her.

questions.question: What is the outcome of Ross and Rachel's conversation about her letter?
options: They decide to get back together
They decide to stay broken up
They decide to take a break from each other
They decide to go to couples therapy
questions.correct_answer: They decide to stay broken up
questions.explanation: Ross and Rachel's conversation about her letter ends with them deciding to stay broken up, with Rachel saying 'We are so over!'
